bibl.title: On Denarii and Other Coin-Terms in the Papyri.
bibl.note: List I (pp. 272-282): "Denarii" in the papyri. - List II (pp. 282-286): Other Roman coin-terms in the papyri. - List III (pp. 286-292): "The emperor's silver coins" in the papyri. - List IV (pp. 292-298): "Ptolemaic" coins in the papyri.
Christiansen Erik, On Denarii and Other Coin-Terms in the Papyri.
